title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: self-host large language models with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models.

title: ollama-webui (open-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with chat history, model management, RAG and plugin system.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-built Rust crate providing async/sync bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat wrapper with markdown rendering and conversation persistence.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight official Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models for generative QA and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server in containers.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module wrapping Ollama JS client for easy dependency injection in Node apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with async chat and generate methods.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper around Ollama REST API with GenServer-backed process pooling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module for CI pipelines that pre-pulls and benchmarks Ollama models.
